name: ReceiptBot Pro
description: Advanced AI-powered receipt processing platform that automatically extracts, categorizes, and integrates financial data from receipts into accounting systems with real-time expense tracking and fraud detection capabilities.

name: CodeBlock Generator
description: No-code platform that transforms natural language descriptions into functional WordPress blocks, plugins, and custom code components with automated testing and deployment capabilities.

name: SecureCode AI
description: Intelligent code security platform that detects vulnerabilities, security flaws, and potential exploits in AI-generated code with automated fixes and compliance reporting.

name: ArticleToVideo Pro
description: Advanced content transformation platform that converts written articles, blog posts, and documents into engaging video content with AI narration, animations, and customizable templates.

name: SocialVid Analytics
description: Comprehensive social video intelligence platform that searches, analyzes, and summarizes video content across social media platforms with sentiment analysis and trend tracking.
